description: This shakshuka has extra veg and flaked almond crunch on top.
keywords: Shakshuka,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Shakshuka with Feta & Almonds Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped
1 medium red capsicum, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan on medium high, add the onions and capsicum and fry for 3-4 minutes to soften. Add the garlic, chilli and paprika and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes, until thick.
Using a wooden spoon, make 4 hollows in the sauce and crack 2 eggs into each. Reduce the heat to low, place a lid on the pan and cook for 6-8 minutes until the eggs are set.
Scatter chopped coriander, feta and flaked almonds on top and serve.
